entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Burns Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:01 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burns Lake Airport 02:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
Temperature: -15.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -17.6°C
Wind: NW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Fog. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:56 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating in the morning then cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:56 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:56 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
